channel.title: MC Server Advice
channel.description:
My dad has a vps for his company but he's not using it. I asked him if I can host a server and he said yes. So I've been working on it and these are the plugins I have:
BigBrother Essentials Pack Factions Lwc Multiple Home Simple Sign Edit Starter Kit World Edit/Guard
So what I need it should I add other plugins and which plugins should I remove.

item.title: MC Server Advice
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

i have bolded the bad plugins

BigBrother
Essentials Pack
Factions
Lwc
Multiple Home
Simple Sign Edit
Starter Kit
World Edit/Guard

Read full topic

item.title: MC Server Advice
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:13, topic:410434”][quote author=Tom_BETA link=topic=511719.msg3717855#msg3717855 date=1313757953]

[quote author=B2300 T4nk link=topic=511719.msg3717811#msg3717811 date=1313752558]

[quote author=Tom_BETA link=topic=511719.msg3716172#msg3716172 date=1313647754]

Can i join your server?
I’ve been looking for a new server since loled’s wen’t down.
[/quote]Sure. Atleast its going to be 24/7 and not laggy

Don’t count on it.
[/quote]Your server was hosted in Japan >:(. Lol jk. But there might be slight lag but not that huge.

No it wasn’t.

You can’t say how much lagg will occur on a server, it just doesn’t work like that. You may have the best host in the world but that doesn’t account for other external troubles which can occur such as a busy network and so on, or something going wrong with minecraft itself.

Hell, moparisthebests server has something like 16GB RAM I believe and moparcraft can be horribly laggy, and suffers from downtime. Just saying: downtime/lagg is going to happen!
[/quote]Its laggy because the map is huge.[/quote]It has nothing to do with map size, it’s simply because the minecraft code is shit.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:

Can i join your server?
I’ve been looking for a new server since loled’s wen’t down.
[/quote]Sure. Atleast its going to be 24/7 and not laggy

Don’t count on it.
[/quote]Your server was hosted in Japan >:(. Lol jk. But there might be slight lag but not that huge.

No it wasn’t.

You can’t say how much lagg will occur on a server, it just doesn’t work like that. You may have the best host in the world but that doesn’t account for other external troubles which can occur such as a busy network and so on, or something going wrong with minecraft itself.

Hell, moparisthebests server has something like 16GB RAM I believe and moparcraft can be horribly laggy, and suffers from downtime. Just saying: downtime/lagg is going to happen![/quote]Its laggy because the map is huge.

Read full topic

item.title: MC Server Advice
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:11, topic:410434”][quote author=Tom_BETA link=topic=511719.msg3716172#msg3716172 date=1313647754]

[quote author=B2300 T4nk link=topic=511719.msg3716088#msg3716088 date=1313637947]

Can i join your server?
I’ve been looking for a new server since loled’s wen’t down.
[/quote]Sure. Atleast its going to be 24/7 and not laggy

Don’t count on it.
[/quote]Your server was hosted in Japan >:(. Lol jk. But there might be slight lag but not that huge.[/quote]

No it wasn’t.

You can’t say how much lagg will occur on a server, it just doesn’t work like that. You may have the best host in the world but that doesn’t account for other external troubles which can occur such as a busy network and so on, or something going wrong with minecraft itself.

Hell, moparisthebests server has something like 16GB RAM I believe and moparcraft can be horribly laggy, and suffers from downtime. Just saying: downtime/lagg is going to happen!

Read full topic

item.title: MC Server Advice
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

I’ve heard of skyland before, at least I’m pretty sure that’s what it was called. It’s like a world you teleport to form the normal world, I guess you could say kinda like going to nether. When you get there it’s basically a bunch of broken up chunks of land floating in mid air that have different materials you can mine. Usually you use the compass plugin that lets you go to your pointer’s location on left click, or go through on left click to get around out there. Just don’t fall off

Read full topic
